name: Parking Legend: Driving School
description:
Experience gameplay of 3d perfect driving simulator missions to bush up your parking car driver license into real car driving school 2018 master. If you looking for hard parking games or best car parking games 2018 with challenge and obstacle course based retro car parking game then your search for modern driving simulator game is over. Are you ready to sit as speed car driver to take real extreme parker challenge? Parking Legend: Driving School offers you multi-level parking zone game with lots of challenging parallel parking, reverse frenzy car driving and smart driver game for sports car driving simulator game lovers. No more gas station simulator or highway service requires show extreme parking mania skills with cool parking hard games inside drift car driver garage in smart parking simulator game.

Features of Parking Legend: Driving School:
-Different camera views of new car parking 2018.
-Realistic sound effects of extreme multi storey parking 3d.
-Car park driver game has high-quality 3D graphics.
-Multiple sports cars added in the car driving game.
-Excellent control of real car parking simulator 3d 2018.
-Realistic driving experience.
